backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with product, stock, promotion, payment, transaction, and user types plus maps for state and authorization mixin setup.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a simple migration module that returns old category data unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for the POS system.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files including offline storage, i18n, catalog utilities, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root container and main React script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme color, icons, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic asset caching, fetch interception, and cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router setup with themed layout, authentication gate, and route definitions for all POS pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application layout with navigation links, theme toggling, user menu, and logout handling based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows a warning alert when the browser goes offline by listening to online/offline events.
frontend/src/features/admin/sampleData.t: Defines preset sample categories, products, and payment methods, saves them to offline storage, and queues them for sync.
frontend/src/features/admin/SampleDataLo: Provides a UI card to load sample categories, products, and payment methods, including confirmation and loading states.
frontend/src/features/admin/UsersPage.ts: Renders the user management page with role descriptions and includes the sample data loader tool.
frontend/src/features/auth/AdminReauthDi: Displays a dialog requiring admin reauthentication for sensitive actions using Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Gates access based on authentication state, showing login UI or profile setup when needed before rendering children.
frontend/src/features/auth/IdleLock.tsx: Locks the session after inactivity and requires reauthentication to unlock, tracking user activity events.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter name and role, saving the profile via an actor mutation.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCurrentUse: Fetches and returns the current user profile and admin role using React Query and an actor instance.
frontend/src/features/barcode/barcodeRes: Searches products and variants to find a matching barcode and returns the matched objects.
frontend/src/features/barcode/CameraBarc: Displays a camera-based barcode scanner with manual input fallback and handles camera permission errors.
frontend/src/features/barcode/HidBarcode: Listens for HID keyboard-style barcode input and triggers a scan callback when Enter is pressed.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogFor: Defines product form data structure and validates required fields and pricing rules.
frontend/src/features/catalog/CatalogPag: Manages product and category creation/editing with dialogs, form state, offline storage, and syncing.
frontend/src/features/catalog/catalogSto: Exports product keys and applies upsert updates to a product list via ID mapping.
frontend/src/features/catalog/ProductCsv: Provides CSV import/export for products with error handling and format instructions.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutP: Handles checkout flow including payments, validation, transaction creation, and navigation.
frontend/src/features/checkout/paymentVa: Validates payment totals ensuring payments exist and cover the amount due.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Inventor: Displays stock levels, highlights low-stock items, and allows stock adjustments with offline syncing.
frontend/src/features/inventory/inventor: Zustand store for managing a global lowâ€‘stock threshold setting.
frontend/src/features/inventory/Receivin: UI for recording incoming stock, updating product quantities and variant costs, and syncing receiving records offline.
frontend/src/features/payments/PaymentMe: Page to add and manage payment methods, including enabling or disabling them and syncing changes offline.
frontend/src/features/pos/cartStore.ts: Persistent Zustand cart store handling item management, discounts, tax, and computed totals.
frontend/src/features/pos/PosPage.tsx: POS interface with product search, barcode scanning, cart operations, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/features/pos/priceTier.ts: Utility functions to select price tiers based on quantity and return appropriate variant pricing.
frontend/src/features/pos/productSelecto: Hook that filters active products and supports searching by name, SKU, and barcode.
frontend/src/features/promotions/promoEn: Logic to check promotion eligibility and compute discount amounts based on promotion rules.
frontend/src/features/promotions/Promoti: UI for creating and listing promotions with fields like type, value, coupon codes, and active status.
frontend/src/features/pwa/PwaInstallGuid: Page showing PWA install options, benefits, and step-by-step instructions with install prompt handling and toast messages.
frontend/src/features/receipts/PrintRece: Dialog for selecting receipt width, previewing a receipt, and triggering browser print.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptTe: Generates printable receipt layout using transaction details, totals, and payment breakdown.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportCalc: Utility functions computing daily revenue summaries and aggregated product sales.
frontend/src/features/reports/ReportsPag: Displays sales reports with date filtering, summaries, product data, and CSV export.
frontend/src/features/returns/ReturnFlow: UI for entering a transaction ID and showing basic return policy, with placeholder search logic.
frontend/src/features/sync/SyncStatusPag: Monitors offline sync queue, shows counts and last sync time, and allows manual syncing.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Displays detailed transaction info, including items, payments, and print option, loaded via offline storage.
frontend/src/features/transactions/trans: Provides functions to compute net sales accounting for refunds and to return refunded items back to inventory.
frontend/src/features/void/VoidTransacti: Dialog for voiding a transaction requiring a reason and admin reauthentication before confirming.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/i18n/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, dates, date-times, and numbers using Indonesian locale.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.id.ts: Contains all Indonesian translation strings for navigation, POS, checkout, catalog, and common UI text.
frontend/src/i18n/t.ts: Simple translation helper that resolves keys into Indonesian strings, with fallback warnings for missing keys.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles, color variables, dark mode, utility classes, and print styles for receipts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/offline/masterDataCache.ts: Provides a hook to load cached master data from offline storage via React Query.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for master data, transactions, and sync queue with CRUD helpers and queuing for sync.
frontend/src/offline/syncQueue.ts: Provides sync queue retrieval and processing, updating item status and attempts with placeholder sync logic.
frontend/src/pwa/useInstallPrompt.ts: React hook managing PWA installation prompt, tracking availability and installation state.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Exports generic data arrays to semicolon-delimited CSV files using browser Blob download.
frontend/src/utils/csvParse.ts: Exports product CSV and imports semicolon-delimited product data, validating rows and preparing product objects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the PWA POS project state, architecture decisions, known issues, and existing implemented features. Highlights Motoko backend, React frontend, offline-lite constraints, CSV delimiter choice, and several UI/feature bugs.
